question: I am a 22 year old Muslim girl. I have not married yet nor have any proposals. Please advise on what I can pray for the accomplishment of marriage to a good Muslim boy
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Perform 2 Rakaats Salaatul Haajat and pray to Allah. beg of Him to grant your wishes.

Also, recite the following Du?aa after every Salaat, ?Rabbanaa aatinaa fid-dunyaa hasanatan wa fil aakhirat hasanatan wa qinaa adhaaban-naar?.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.

CHECKED AND APPROVED: Mufti Ebrahim Desai
